title: Jack Ellis (rugby league)
text:
Edwin Horace "Jack" Ellis is a New Zealand <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who represented <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">New Zealand</a>.
Playing career.
Ellis played in the <a href="Canterbury%20Rugby%20League">Canterbury Rugby League</a> competition and represented <a href="Canterbury%20rugby%20league%20team">Canterbury</a> in 1924.
He played in six matches for <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">New Zealand</a> during the <a href="1925%20New%20Zealand%20rugby%20league%20tour%20of%20Australia">1925 tour of Australia</a>. No test matches were played during the tour.
